Question: In 1795, when France took over the entire island of Hispaniola, this person's remains were moved to Havana, Cuba.
Hints: Quotations related to this person at Wikiquote.
"this person's claim to fame isn't that he got there first," explains historian Martin Dugard, "it's that he stayed.".
